item.title: No, People Aren’t Being ‘Kidnapped’ or ‘Disappeared’
item.description: DHS is not a criminal enterprise.

item.title: Who’s Really Twisting the Covid Record?
item.description: Some on the left accuse conservatives of rewriting coronavirus history. Figures such as Anthony Fauci have been doing so in full public view.

item.title: Andy Beshear Doubles Down on Leftism to Prepare for 2028
item.description: If the moderate-seeming governor of red state Kentucky thinks veering left is the key to presidential victory, he should think again.

item.title: Yes, Recognize the Unique British Contribution to Slavery — Ending It
item.description: Activists want a permanent exhibit at the British Museum to commemorate the country’s role in the slave trade. They should get it, but not in the way ...

item.title: Republicans Should Get Rid of What’s Left of the Inflation Reduction Act
item.description: It’s good politics and good policy to eliminate as many of the act’s remaining environmentalist handouts as possible.
